about_the_game:
In Jungle Rumble, you'll embark on an exhilarating adventure deep in the heart of the Amazon jungle. As an unparalleled warrior bravely facing off against the sinister Skull and his army, you'll become a true Rambo in this epic battle for the freedom of the jungles. Confront dangerous traps, cunning snipers, and a multitude of enemies to overcome all obstacles and defeat the villain. Can you restore peace and tranquility to the wilds of the Amazon?


Key Features:
  • Uncompromising Combat System: The deep jungle is full of dangers, and you'll need to use all your skills to survive and emerge victorious over the enemies, just like a real Rambo.
  • Powerful Arsenal: Your arsenal includes various weapons, from assault rifles to rocket launchers. Blast red barrels to deal massive damage to enemies, just like Rambo.
  • Diverse Locations: Explore dense jungles, ancient ruins, and treacherous swamps, each offering its own challenges and opportunities, just like in a real Rambo adventure.
  • Epic Bosses: Face off against mighty bosses standing in your way, and use all your skills to defeat them and progress further, just like a true Rambo.
  • Preparation for the Finale: Prepare for an exhilarating final battle with the sinister Skull and deliver the final blow to restore peace to the Amazon jungle, in the spirit of a true Rambo.

name: Jungle Rumble

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti 2gb
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Become a fearless soldier, face off against the evil Skull and his army in the heart of the Amazon jungle. Survive deadly traps, ambushes, and explosive battles to restore peace. Will you emerge victorious?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
